title: Hello London
creator_credit: Kinran, George Fowler and Sidney Smith
brief_description: Musical film starring Olympic gold medalist and world famous ice-skater, Sonja Henie, and co-starring Michael Wilding with Stanley Holloway. Light-hearted song and dance film on ice set in London. The cast, including Sonja, all play under their own names.
